refnamediv.refpurpose: Installs or updates the infrastructure of a distributed system

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: The command disnixos-deploy-network is used to install or upgrade the NixOS configurations of machines in a network through the Disnix service.

This command is similar to the NixOS command nixos-deploy-network, except that it uses the Disnix interface as communication layer (instead of SSH directly) and it also notifies running services of an upgrade, so that they can optionally block/queue connections.
